mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, COURSE_ID, COMMENT, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM COURSE_REPLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_REPLY( ID, USER_ID, COURSE_ID, COMMENT, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES(#{id}, #{user_id}, #{course_id}, #{comment}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE COURSE SET ID = #{id}, USER_ID = #{user_id}, COURSE_ID = #{course_id}, COMMENT = #{comment}, MODIFIED_DATE = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
